S.FORM: Steve Alford sraral hya'ga sisyuw na NBA, p'aras mari' tay suruw. kawas tay 1964, ryax sa tay 23 nqu tay 11, Steve Alford, squliq na p'unro. cinkhulan sa knita' sa brbiru' Lists of National Basketball Association players

Steve Alford sraral hya'ga sisyow na NBA, p'aras mari' tay sorow. kawas tay 1964, ryax sa tay 23 nqo tay 11, Steve Alford, sqoliq na p'onro. cinkholan sa knita' sa brbiro' Lists of National Basketball Association players
